body_html: Is there any update on this other than the python level multiplication suggested by @jihunchoi ? This is an important feature for highly imbalanced data in multi-label case. For instance attribute recognition datasets are highly imbalanced from class to class (sometimes less than 1% positive examples per attribute) and are multi-label. If BCE supports weights for each and every sample (meaning same shape as target), it'll be useful.
